# Database Versions

The following table lists the database versions with brief descriptions of each.  Note that database versions and TC versions are numbered independently.

<!-- AUTOGENERATED DO NOT EDIT -->
| DB Version | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [0001](./0001.yml) | fake wigets table for DB deployment testing |
| [0002](./0002.yml) | define all taskcluster-lib-entities tables and functions |
| [0003](./0003.yml) | define all taskcluster-lib-azqueue tables and functions |
| [0004](./0004.yml) | fix typestamps in `azure_queue_messages` |
| [0005](./0005.yml) | fix ordering of results returned from `azure_queue_get` |
| [0006](./0006.yml) | update `azure_queue_count` to count only non-expired rows |
| [0007](./0007.yml) | bugfix for `.._scan` taskcluster-lib-entities methods |
| [0008](./0008.yml) | introduce `encode/decode_composite_key`, `encode/decode_string_key`, and `entity_buf_encode/decode` |
| [0009](./0009.yml) | purge-cache phase 2 |
| [0010](./0010.yml) | worker-manager worker pools phase 2 |
| [0011](./0011.yml) | drop widgets table from version 1 |
| [0012](./0012.yml) | worker-manager workers phase 2 |
| [0013](./0013.yml) | add capacity to worker pools |
| [0014](./0014.yml) | add secret to workers |
| [0015](./0015.yml) | add `sha512` function |
| [0016](./0016.yml) | add `uuid_to_slugid` and `slugid_to_uuid` functions |
| [0017](./0017.yml) | notify phase 2 step 1+2 |
| [0018](./0018.yml) | index phase 2 step 1 |
| [0019](./0019.yml) | queue artifacts phase 2 step 1 (slow migration: about 20μs per row in table `queue_artifacts_entities`) |
| [0020](./0020.yml) | queue tasks phase 2 step 1 (slow migration: 700-2000μs per row in table `queue_tasks_entities`) |
| [0021](./0021.yml) | queue task groups phase 2 step 1 |
| [0022](./0022.yml) | queue task dependencies phase 2 step 1 (slow migration: 10μs per row in table `queue_task_dependency_entities`) |
| [0023](./0023.yml) | github builds phase 2 |
| [0024](./0024.yml) | queue artifacts phase 2 step 2 |
| [0025](./0025.yml) | auth roles phase 2 |
| [0026](./0026.yml) | index phase 2 step 2 |
| [0027](./0027.yml) | web-server github access tokens phase 2 step 1+2 |
| [0028](./0028.yml) | queue tasks, task groups, dependencies phase 2 step 2 |
| [0029](./0029.yml) | worker-manager worker pools phase 2 |
| [0030](./0030.yml) | bugfix for sha512() |
| [0031](./0031.yml) | bugfix for get_worker_pool_errors_for_worker_pool |
| [0032](./0032.yml) | hooks last-fire phase 2 |
| [0033](./0033.yml) | hooks queues phase 2 |
| [0034](./0034.yml) | add crypto container functions `entity_to_crypto_container_v0` and `encrypted_entity_buf_encode` |
| [0035](./0035.yml) | hooks hooks phase 2 |
| [0036](./0036.yml) | github integrations phase 2 |
| [0037](./0037.yml) | github checks phase 2 |
| [0038](./0038.yml) | web-server sessions phase 2 |
| [0039](./0039.yml) | web-server authorization codes phase 2 |
| [0040](./0040.yml) | web-server access tokens phase 2 |
<!-- AUTOGENERATED DO NOT EDIT - END -->
